article.title: QinetiQ North America Operations to Support FBI Engineering Research Facility
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: QinetiQ North America's security and intelligence services business unit has been awarded a five-year time and materials contract with the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) to provide security management and support services to the Bureau's Engineering Research Facility at Quantico, Virginia. The contract has a maximum value of $3.7 million.
